title: To all you people wanting moonflair spellblade in the rift.

replies.body: Yes? not seeing your point there...
what exactly is moonflair spellblade
A twisted treeline item that grants 50 ap, armor, mr, and 35 percent tenacity.

> [{quoted}](name=l   Sion Bot   l,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yrHu%%%3,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-02-20T00:18:37.027+0000)
>
> what exactly is moonflair spellblade

A really perfectly well rounded item that will be in every mages build if it were to ever make it into Summoner's Rift.
that jax will blow up in a second. moonflair doesn´make you cc immune, it just adds some tenacity.

You do know what jax's ult does right?

and with this build we are talking about 150 armor and mr. so just try blowing him up.
just google effective health, it might enlighten you.

I know what effective health is, which is why I know that the sustain gunblade gives is going to be worth so much more when he ults and has 300 armor and 250 magic resist.

Or did you forget that he was building that.
That build is horrible.

That build sacrifices only health, still deals a ton of magic damage, a ton of physical damage, has a ton of armor and mr when ulting, has a ton of attack speed, has 40% cdr, gets the tabi basic reduction, gets omnivamp, and gets tenacity, mind saying that again?
That build is too squishy. You definitely don't need all of those damage items to be effective.

Yeah, but I get tank stats for building damage, so why would I not build damage? Top it off with a damage item that gives tank stats as well as tenacity, and you have the perfect storm. So I don't have to choose between tenacity and tabis. Also my r would give me about 150 armor and magic resist. Meaning that the omnivamp is putting in serious work because I have damage.

> [{quoted}](name=skaarj888,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yrHu%%%3,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2017-02-20T03:40:25.077+0000)
>
> That build sacrifices only health, still deals a ton of magic damage, a ton of physical damage, has a ton of armor and mr when ulting, has a ton of attack speed, has 40% cdr, gets the tabi basic reduction, gets omnivamp, and gets tenacity, mind saying that again?

That build is most definitely terrible.
Yes I want it. It would become Core on Mordekaiser
yup
Yes I still want it.
i feel like jaxes core build becomes triforce moonflair and then tank items because that is all he ever needs.
I mean Riot doesn't really like that item because it's basically just a stat stick.

{{item:3089}}, {{item:3083}}, and {{item:3031}} are also basically a stat stick, IMO. I don't know much about how good {{item:3170}} is, but I'd gladly take another AP/Armour item, I hate building {{item:3157}}.

> [{quoted}](name=Legacy Hydralpha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yrHu%%%3,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2017-02-20T12:44:20.280+0000)
>
> {{item:3089}}, {{item:3083}}, and {{item:3031}} are also basically a stat stick, IMO. I don't know much about how good {{item:3170}} is, but I'd gladly take another AP/Armour item, I hate building {{item:3157}}.

Yeah I know. They're just more of Riot's double standards.
And who benefits more from stat sticks than anyone else? {{champion:24}}

> [{quoted}](name=skaarj888,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yrHu%%%3,comment-id=000f0001,timestamp=2017-02-20T18:25:20.365+0000)
>
> And who benefits more from stat sticks than anyone else? {{champion:24}}

I mean, not really.
He has good ap ratios, good ad ratios, scales well with attack speed, and gets tank stats for damage. He loves stat sticks more than anyone else.

> [{quoted}](name=skaarj888,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yrHu%%%3,comment-id=000f000100000000,timestamp=2017-02-21T22:50:59.072+0000)
>
> He has good ap ratios, good ad ratios, scales well with attack speed, and gets tank stats for damage. He loves stat sticks more than anyone else.

Ap ratios are good true, but his AD ratios aren't. His scaling with attack speed is good. He wouldn't use moonflair spellblade realistically.
as someone who plays a decent amount of vlad, im ok with jax being played more if i get access to moonflair
remember when wooglet's was still a thing on the rift especially with fizz ._.

Zhonyas Ring?

The item that made Kennen a living god?
Yes I do because Jax isn't viable nor would he ever build that build because he'd overcap on attack speed. Giving Jax a new item to buff him doesn't fix his problems.
hell naw i just changed my mind

I never minded Jax all that much.
I'd cope.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D4WO0mirjlQ
Why does Jax still build tabis anyway btw? It used to have a dodge stat that synergized with his E, but it does not anymore.
yeah i still want it.
Yeah I would still want it :)

{{champion:24}}  can't even get to his lategame fantasy land thanks to games ending at the 20-30 minute mark on average.

The absolute worst abuser of Moonblade wouldn't even be jax

{{champion:28}} would abuse that more than jax because it gives her stats an eve would want and her being a diver the tenacity makes her even stronger 

{{champion:39}} would abuse it because of the stacking tenacity and ability power

{{champion:14}}  it would be come a core Item for him no matter where you go

{{champion:85}} would use it to dive more consistently and not be shut down by CC as easily

{{champion:80}} would use it  to garuntee his toplane trades and overall getting fed to snowball himself

{{champion:56}}  see eve

{{champion:35}} only super viable shaco build is AP right now and therefore it'd be used on him

{{champion:143}} would be used so she can get botlane snowballed better

{{champion:32}}  would be able to be relevant other than just a OH HAI I AM HERE NOW AND  I  ULT AND SOAK DAMAGE

Lategame with Jax, you would literally be capable of 1v5 fights pretty easily because you wouldn't have to sacrifice tenacity for tabis, so you will be tanky, deal an insane amount of damage, have omnivamp so you heal off of that damage, have tenacity so you don't get destroyed by cc as much, and you get it all with the nice package of 40% cdr.

Irelia has two abilities that scale with ap and she builds mercs more often than tabi anyway because she goes so well with dmp

Sion is better either going full tank or full ad, so this really would not be that good on him

Kennen rushes Zhonyas

You would lose every trade top because panth scales with bonus ad, not base

Nocturne builds banshees, edge of night, and has a spellshield in his kit, if that isn't buying him enough time nothing will.

If Ap shaco doesn't build items that give him more upfront burst, he literally will not be able to do anything, and 50 ap is not alot of upfront burst.

Zyra (even support) has around 8k in gold in must buy items before she even gets to decide what she builds.

Amumu deals alot more damage than people like to think, so I don't know where the whole "useless" thing is coming from, seriously have you ever seen one that built {{item:1401}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3030}} {{item:3111}}

{{champion:24}}  is still in a horrid spot RN thanks to how fast games are ending... if the game manages to hit lategame jax deserves to have his lategame fantasy as it's his best part of the game.

I can see where you're coming from with {{champion:39}}  but she's more debatable on the Item

{{champion:14}}  gets enough extra health from his W passive that {{item:3170}} in addition to {{item:3111}}  would force Sion's everywhere to build it simply for the statage being well endowed.

{{champion:85}} could get {{item:3170}}  as second Item after {{item:3157}}... nothing that says he can't

You forgot {{champion:28}}  lmao


{{champion:80}} has AP scalings in his W and his ultimate

lots of {{champion:56}}'s  are building {{item:3814}} . I'm pretty sure that you can never have enough time to have reduced CC

{{champion:35}}  I'm pretty sure that at the Shaco's who want to go more tanky are going to buy {{item:3170}}  instead of {{item:3157}}  or a {{item:3156}} 

{{champion:143}} is another debatable champ for the Item

I didn't say  {{champion:32}}  was useless but that he only does a few things. One of which is to go in... the other? to ult to stop enemy team from doing nearly anything.  His damage is okay for a tank but nothing on {{champion:98}}  {{champion:78}}  level of tank damage

so we have a few dissagreements but I'm still glad that we can talk about them respectfully
Rather face that than some of the abusive stuff now days.
{{champion:82}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:131}}
Yes
Remove tenacity. Buff something else on it, gg.
Jax sucks.
